    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()

    • testBoard

      @Test public void testBoard()
      Test if the board is initialized with all empty fields.

    • testDeepCopy

      @Test public void testDeepCopy()
      Test deepCopy() method. Check if it indeed creates another exact copy of the original board.

    • testIndex

      @Test public void testIndex()
      Test the index() method. Check if the method returns the right index of the field, given the index of row and col

    • testIsFieldIndex

      @Test public void testIsFieldIndex()
      Test isField(int index) method. Check if a random index is a valid index of a field on the board.

    • testIsFieldRowCol

      @Test public void testIsFieldRowCol()
      Test isField(int row, int col) method. Given a row and col, check if it is a valid field.

    • testSetAndGetFieldIndex

      @Test public void testSetAndGetFieldIndex()
      Test setField(int index) and getField(int index) method. Check if we can set the field and get the field (given the index).

    • testGetFieldRowAndCol

      @Test public void testGetFieldRowAndCol()
      Test setField(int row, int col) and getField(int row, int col) method. Check if we can set the field and get the field (given the row and the col).

    • testIsEmptyFieldIndex

      @Test public void testIsEmptyFieldIndex()
      Test isEmptyField(int index) method. Check if the field is empty (given the index).

    • testIsEmptyFieldRowAndCol

      @Test public void testIsEmptyFieldRowAndCol()
      Test isEmptyField(int row, int col) method. Check if the field is empty (given the row, col).

    • testIsMarkedField

      @Test public void testIsMarkedField()
      Test isMarkedField(int index) method. Check if at a given index, the field is marked as FILLED or not.

    • testIsFull

      @Test public void testIsFull()
      Test isFull() method. Check if the board is full or not.

    • testHasSquare

      @Test public void testHasSquare()
      Test hasSquare() method. Check if the player is able to form a square at that index

    • testIsGameOver

      @Test public void testIsGameOver()
      Test gameOver() method. Check if the game is over or not.

    • testIsDraw

      @Test public void testIsDraw()
      Test isDraw() method. Check if the board returns the draw case.

    • testIsWinner

      @Test public void testIsWinner()
      Test isWinner() method. Check if the player with a given mark is the winner.

    • testHasWinner

      @Test public void testHasWinner()
      Test hasWinner() method. Check if there is a winner on the board.

    • testReset

      @Test public void testReset()
      Test reset() method. Check if the board resets to all Mark.EMPTY

    • testToRow

      @Test public void testToRow()
      Test toRow() method. Check if it can convert to a row index (given a field index)

    • testCol

      @Test public void testCol()
      Test toCol() method. Check if it can convert to a column index (given a field index)
